trans-unit.source: Container for all extended editor logic for properties.
trans-unit.target: 属性的所有扩展编辑器逻辑的容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor> class can hold two <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, one for an inline editor and one for an extended editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor> 类可保存两个 <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> 对象，其中一个用于内联编辑器，另一个用于扩展编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The inline editor provides a custom interface that appears within the bounds of the `Properties` window, and the extended editor provides an interface that appears in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 内联编辑器提供的边界内显示的自定义接口`Properties`窗口中，并扩展的编辑器提供一个接口，在新窗口中显示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the visual interface for the inline editor, and the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the extended editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> 属性返回内联编辑器的可视界面的 XAML 模板，而 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> 属性返回扩展编辑器的 XAML 模板。

trans-unit.source: These are typically provided in a ResourceDictionary elsewhere in the project.
trans-unit.target: 这些通常在项目其他地方的 ResourceDictionary 中提供。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> to invoke your custom <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor>.
trans-unit.target: 您应该使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> 来调用自定义的 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> class.

Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> class without specified extended and inline editor <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> 类的新实例，该实例没有指定的扩展和内联编辑器 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: 用于弹出或固定的扩展编辑器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> used for the inline editor.
trans-unit.target: 用于内联编辑器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> with the specified extended and inline editor <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的扩展和内联编辑器 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> 对象来创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用，则其 <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> 设置为 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />，它用于弹出或固定的扩展编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> object used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: 用于弹出或固定的扩展编辑器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 对象。
